channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Very pleased': Trump's guilty verdict ignites mixed reactions outside NYC courtroom
item.description: Fox News Digital interviewed several people outside a New York City courtroom moments after former President Trump was found guilty on all charges against him.

item.title: 2024 Showdown: Trump and Biden quickly cash in on former president's guilty verdicts
item.description: The campaigns of President Biden and former President Trump quickly cashed in on the guilty verdicts in Trump's criminal trial for their 2024 election rematch.

item.title: Justice Breyer Says SCOTUS Majority Doing It All Wrong
item.description: The question of how judges analyze the Constitution and statutes is perhaps the most pressing legal issue of our time.

item.title: 'Salute me or shoot me': Venezuelan gang members sneaking into US pose 'serious threat'
item.description: A number of illegal immigrants affiliated with the Venezuelan gang Tren de Aragua were nabbed in Texas this week, according to the top U.S. border official.

First on Fox: Calls for State Department to abandon 'obsession' with DEI and 'depoliticize,' new report says
item.description: The Heritage Foundation urged the State Department to dismantle it's Office of Diversity and Inclusion and to prioritize standardized testing as a means of determining qualified candidates.
